verbs.description: [ARG0: pizzeria manager] [V: drives] [ARG1: 225 miles] [ARGM-PRP: to deliver pizza to terminally ill man] this is a sweet tale of a pizza delivery driver who went the extra mile actually he went the extra 225 miles from battle creek michigan to indianapolis indiana just to give a man in hospice care a final taste of his favorite pizza cue our grinch hearts swelling shaffer steves pizzeria indianapolis battle creek wttv michigan steve pizzeria steve facebook rich morgan dalton indiana pizza
